Jamun diseased: Prune and burn infected branches/twigs immediately after harvest, collect and destroy fallen infected fruits and leaves, spray copper oxychloride 0.3% or carbendazim 0.1% + mancozeb 0.2% twice at 15-day intervals during monsoon for anthracnose/leaf spot, drench soil with trichoderma viride or carbendazim for root rot/wilt if present.
